title: Public Hearing - 2026 Budget & Revenue Resources
lede:
The Board of Commissioners for SJC Fire Protection District 3 will be holding public hearings relating to its annual 2026 Budget on the following dates and times. Written and verbal testimony will be accepted from the public. Regular meetings are held at 1011 Mullis Street, Friday Harbor Washington. 

Meeting agenda & 2026 Budget found at: https://www.sjifire.org/about/governance/

**Revenue Resources for the 2026 Budget for SJC Fire Protection District 3**

November 11, 2025 at 3:00 p.m. or soon thereafter

**Final 2026 Budget for SJC Fire Protection District 3**

November 11, 2025 at 3:15 p.m. or soon thereafter
body:
